languages.text: "Коли столь милостив{mf||а} наш{mf||а} гость{mf||я}, может, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} изволит вприкуску к дару моему еще и последнюю Тассерианскую сплетню послушать?"
"Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"
languages.original_text: "Коли столь милостив{mf||а} наш{mf||а} гость{mf||я}, может, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} изволит вприкуску к дару моему еще и последнюю Тассерианскую сплетню послушать?"

"Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

languages.text: “这位大人是来自上界的尊者，是优雅的典范。或许，{mf|他|她}愿意赏光听听塔瑟拉最近的八卦，作为这件礼物的伴礼？”
languages.original_text: "Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

traits.locale_text: “这位大人是来自上界的尊者，是优雅的典范。或许，{mf|他|她}愿意赏光听听塔瑟拉最近的八卦，作为这件礼物的伴礼？”

languages.text: 「優雅さの化身たる天の{mf|君|姫}に、俺からのプレゼントに添えて、最新のタッセーラの噂話などもお耳に入れて差し上げても…よろしいですかな？」
languages.original_text: "Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

traits.locale_text: 「優雅さの化身たる天の{mf|君|姫}に、俺からのプレゼントに添えて、最新のタッセーラの噂話などもお耳に入れて差し上げても…よろしいですかな？」

languages.text: «Siendo el dechado de virtudes que es, quizá mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial quiera dignarse a deleitar sus oídos con los cotilleos más recientes de Thasseria como acompañamiento de mi regalo».
languages.original_text: "Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

traits.locale_text: «Siendo el dechado de virtudes que es, quizá mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial quiera dignarse a deleitar sus oídos con los cotilleos más recientes de Thasseria como acompañamiento de mi regalo».

languages.text: "Zarafet timsali Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, armağanıma eşlik olarak kulaklarınıza en yeni Thassera dedikodularının çalınmasını ister miydiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

traits.locale_text: "Zarafet timsali Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, armağanıma eşlik olarak kulaklarınıza en yeni Thassera dedikodularının çalınmasını ister miydiniz?"

languages.text: « Étant un parangon de grâce, Votre Céleste Seigneurie daignerait-elle prêter l'oreille aux derniers potins thasseriens pour accompagner mon cadeau ? »
languages.original_text: "Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

traits.locale_text: « Étant un parangon de grâce, Votre Céleste Seigneurie daignerait-elle prêter l'oreille aux derniers potins thasseriens pour accompagner mon cadeau ? »

languages.text: "Möchte {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} als Inbegriff der Gnade auch dem neuesten Klatsch Gehör schenken, der auf Thassera derzeit die Runde macht?"
languages.original_text: "Being the paragon of grace that {mf|he|she} is, would my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, perhaps, also deign to feast {mf|his|her} ears on the latest Thasserian gossip to go with my gift?"

traits.locale_text: "Möchte {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin} als Inbegriff der Gnade auch dem neuesten Klatsch Gehör schenken, der auf Thassera derzeit die Runde macht?"
